title: Awakening
text: You wake up in a small wooden cabin. The morning sun streams through the cracks in the shutters.

choices.label: Stay inside and search the cabin

title: The Forest
text: You step outside into the cool forest air. Birds are singing in the distance.

choices.label: Follow the sound of the birds

title: The Cabin
text: You search the cabin and find an old leather-bound journal.

choices.label: Put it back and leave the cabin

title: Clearing
text: Following the birds, you reach a sunlit clearing with a small stream running through it.

title: Journal
text: The journal tells tales of hidden treasure buried somewhere in the forest.

title: Refreshed
text: The cool water refreshes you. You feel ready for new adventures.
